name: Pointy the Pup Wolf
description:
Pointy the Pup Wolf is a 2D 1920's style game with the main character, Pointy running into mis-fortunite tales of dark shadows!

Aaah! Welcome to our horror show, as here we have our friend Pointy the Pup,

driving along a far way from home, when you seem to have run out of gas!

Don't worry! You'll prevail by trotting your way into these makeshift abandoned

homes to find more! But what a dismay, it's time to believe to see it! Face reality,

danger lurks in these woods as enemies like Bats, Wasps, 'ol Tom Scorpion,

and the monstrous 7 foot Nutcracker's been waiting for the longest time for

someone like you to welcome you home, and too bad! You're here to stay!

Can you survive like the wolfdog you are and prowl and prey to reach you're goal?

Find the gasoline or die tonight! It's Pointy the Pup Wolf, Make Tracks,

the Nutcracker's Coming!

 Tune in for more episodes like,

Dearly Forgotten, Huffin' Looney

...and more to come!

This game is full of images are completely inked from front to back, water-colored backgrounds, and cutscenes  animated frame by frame. I hope to give as much as a engaging, experience. Contact us if you enjoy!
